title: Bug 12952Alt+{char} gets inserted as text
description: (Actually, it's not recommended to use Alt combinations as accelerators, butit's possible).
OB: Bug 12952Alt+{char} gets inserted as text Build 20020404 new text file type Alt+A 'A' gets inserted into the textAlt combinations should not get inserted.They are used for menu mnemonics and accelerators, and should have no effectif there is no corresponding mnemonic or accelerator.
EB: Build 20020404 new text file type Alt+A 'A' gets inserted into the textAlt combinations should not get inserted.They are used for menu mnemonics and accelerators, and should have no effectif there is no corresponding mnemonic or accelerator.
